profiles.i18n_desc: Linux kernel driver for Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S accessories (Recommended)
profiles.i18n_desc[en_US]: Linux kernel driver for Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S accessories (Recommended)
profiles.install_script: export SUDO_USER=$USER; dnf install -y "dnf5-command(builddep)"; usermod -aG pkg-build $SUDO_USER && dnf install -y lpf-xone-firmware xone && lpf approve xone-firmware && lpf build xone-firmware && lpf install xone-firmware
profiles.remove_script: dnf remove -y lpf-xone-firmware xone xone-firmware xpad-noone
